trends: There have been no other sightings in Bleeker
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe light appeared in the mountains of Upstate New York in Bleeker. It moved across the sky, at first resembling a star but than began to stop, hover, and the proceed moving. Shortly after the sighting reports on my scanner indicated a police and military presence in the area. The light then disappeared and all was silent. Moments later the sky was filled with black helicopters followed by a strong police presence in the area.
Summary: Red light in the sky immediately followed by military air craft
